channel.title: Simple Question
channel.description:
Hello, I have a simple question,
How do I get into the RuneScape offical client files? I have loads of codes I want to add but just cant find a way to get into the files. The client was not installed so where are the files?
Thanks
[br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2007, 06:13:44 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

He didn’t even mention the server. Don’t assume people don’t know the difference between client and server just because you’ve never seen them before.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

To get into the RuneScape client files, you just have to download popcorn89’s RS2 Deobfuscator and run deob.bat.

But I don’t know what you want to add, as it’s more detectable than King Kong in China.

However, what I think you want to do, is download the server files, and I’ll just tell you right away,

YOU CAN’T

Read full topic
